ygData.subject: Re: Into the LIGHT!
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson would not let Perceptor leave.  As compassionate as Prime, if it meant that his life was in danger, he would protect a new comrade with his own spark.

Tucson would not let Perceptor leave.  As compassionate as Prime, if it mea=
nt that his life was in danger, he would protect a new comrade with his own=
 spark.

"I can't do that Perceptor. I'm not going to abandon you.  It's my=
 promise from the bottom of my spark and I will not break my promise my new=
 friend.  Take heart, Rat Trap is now able to bypass the computers manually=
, which will allow you to enter the Ark safely until we can alter those sig=
natures of yours."

He stays by him no matter the price his body may pay in=
 the mean time.

In the Ark, Quickstride and Night Shift have the CR chambe=
rs ready for use as they do last minute evaluations on the system.  With a =
thumbs up from Night Shift, the CR Chambers are made ready to accept new pa=
tients.

"We're good ta go in here, Lord Elder."

Rat Trap watches as Tucso=
n remains with Perceptor.

" Good he's still in one piece.  Now that's what=
 I call one tough Autobot."

Tucson Prime now communicates to the Ark.

"Th=
is is Tucson Prime to Lord Elder.  According to my signature readings, Rodi=
mus Prime is in need of help, and a help maybe I can supply him.  From one =
Prime to another, perhaps I can lend him my spark to give him the power he =
needs to recover quickly."

Rat Trap's jaw drops.

"If he does that there's=
 no telln' if he'll survive such a proceedure.  Lord Elder, tell him he can=
't do that!  That's like the ultimate saccrifice and there's a great chance=
 he'll die from it!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:=
